title: Brilliant Minds Is One Of TV’s Finest Medical Dramas: Here’s Why It Deserves a Season 2 Renewal
description: NBC's Brilliant Minds deserves a second season. It's a unique medical drama, and it ended on a high-stakes cliffhanger. The post Brilliant Minds Is One Of TV’s Finest Medical Dramas: Here’s Why It Deserves a Season 2 Renewal appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Laura Nowak

title: TVLine Items: Jimmy Johnson Retires From Fox Sports, PAW Patrol Double Renewal and More
description: Jimmy Johnson is retiring from Fox Sports after 31 years at the network. The Fox NFL studio analyst and former NFL coach made the announcement on The Herd With Colin Cowherd, stating, “Probably the most fun I’ve ever had in my career, and that’s counting Super Bowls and national championships, was at Fox Sports… But […]
author: Vlada Gelman

title: Disney+’s Long-Delayed Tiana Animated Series Has Officially Been Scrapped
description: Tiana won’t have her moment in the spotlight after all: The long-awaited animated series has been shelved by Walt Disney Animation Studios, TVLine has confirmed. Plans for the show — which was originally announced in 2020 and then delayed to 2024 — have officially been cancelled, as the studio abandons creating original longform content for […]
